did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: State, county, and school educational surveys; course materials and student reports; reference materials and pamphlets; materials from conferences and other professional activities of Claude L. Kulp.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Claude Livingston Kulp was a professor of education at Cornell University, and served as superintendent of Ithaca Public Schools, 1930-1951. He was associate commissioner of the State Department of Education briefly, and served in many other positions as an educational administrator. As an education professor at Cornell, he organized or participated in more than 40 state, county, and school educational surveys.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
